attributes.action: Have Presumption of Shared Residence of children In Parental Separation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we had in our family law courts the above law then family law courts would be freed up to deal with complex cases rather than courts full of dads being denied their children and trying to get contact orders enforced after being breached by the resident parent and Parental Responsibilty issues. European countries such as italy,holland,spain and also even Jersey in the channel islands have this and judges claiming to have a drastic reduction in case load because one parent cannot alienate the other its called EQUALITY in law
